Do More With Pivotal HD Community Download Today as a Single Platform Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Now that you have experienced Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) on your laptop do you wish you could do more? You can! Pivotal HD Community <#> is a free version of the world's most powerful Hadoop distribution. Includes:
- A complete community supported distribution of Apache Hadoop 2.0 - Comprehensive Installation, Configuration and Monitoring - Parallel Data Ingest Management - Storage Abstraction - Plugins for Public and Private clouds - The Open Source Java Development Framework
You can deploy Pivotal HD Community directly into your server production environment with a 50 node limit.
Have you registered for our webinar Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node (VM)? Join us as we kick off the first of the series on Thursday, August 1st, 2013 at 9 AM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/PivotalHDLaunchWebinarSession1.html> and 7PM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html> respectively. During this one-hour exploratory webinar you will:
- Get an introduction to Pivotal - Learn what's inside Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) - Understand how to use Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) effectively - See use cases and tutorials - Get your questions answered
Register today for the 9 AM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/PivotalHDLaunchWebinarSession1.html> Register today for the 7 PM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html>
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>.
